Source.Name: perl-xml-writer
Source.Summary: XML::Writer - Perl extension for writing XML documents
Source.Description: XML::Writer is a helper module for Perl programs that write an XML document. The module handles all escaping for attribute values and character data and constructs different types of markup, such as tags, comments, and processing instructions.
